attributes.action: UK Government to roll out Covid vaccines for all UK citizens overseas
attributes.additional_details: Many UK citizens are overseas with or without family members due to Covid, and are unable to get vaccinated and due to the worsening situation are unable to return to the UK due to a combination of quarantine requirements / cost / poor health etc. UK Government can work via its embassies to supply vaccines that can be given to UK nationals, this will take the burden of other nations to provide this so they can focus thier efforts on thier population while working with the UK to reduce Covid.
attributes.background: Provide Covid vaccines to all UK citizens overseas via UK embassies. Many UK citizens are stuck overseas in countries with poor vaccine rollout (eg. Thailand). UK should protect all its citizens during a pandemic
